sections.heading: Recompiled.Section 24-1E-2 - Recompiled
sections.text:
History:1978 Comp., § 24-1E-1, enacted by Laws 1996, ch. 35, § 4; 2001, ch. 225, § 1; recompiled and amended as § 24A-2-1 by Laws 2024, ch. 39, § 39.

Recompilations.— Laws 2024, ch. 39, § 39 recompiled and amended former 24-1E-1 NMSA 1978 as 24A-2-1 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 2024.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
